Description: Amuletic wand; hippopotamus ivory; incised detail.
Curator's comments: Published: Romano, The Bes-Imangein Pharaonic Egypt, vol. I (UMI, 1989), p.33, VOR, pt. 1, p.54-6. Delvaux and Warmenbol, Les Divins chats d'Egypte, (Leuven, 1991), fig.48, p.95. Malek, The Cat in Ancient Egypt, (1993), p.78. Budge, Mummy, p.469. Legge, PSBA, XXVII, p.133, pl.II, fig.2.
